reviewText: Love this show. Wish it was still on TV

I love this show.  I watch reruns on TV all the time and now its nice to own my own.  I can't wait to buy the following seasons.  Great show if you have never watched it.  Some people think the story line is redundant and boring because its always about locating someone who has gone missing -- but I find it to be a great show with great characters.  A must have for any " Without a Trace" fans!
I believe the "Box Set" is the only way to get the first season in Widescreen.

i bought season one and season two seperately, and combined, they cost less than $40..... with free super saver shipping..... do not pay $120 for the set!! i really liked both seasons and can't wait for more to be released on dvd, but this is definitely not worth the money since you get the same thing for less than 1/3 the price....Without a Trace - The Complete Second SeasonWithout a Trace - The Complete First Season
i was very happy with the 2 seasons of without a trace...looking forward to more

Without a Trace - The Complete First Season Without a Trace - The Complete Second Season This is very dumb. BUY THE FIRST AND SECOND SEASONS SEPARATE FROM EACH OTHER. Without a Trace - The Complete First Season Without a Trace - The Complete Second Season

Let's see-- you can buy season 1 for 20 bucks and season 2 for 40 bucks separately... that equals 60 bucks. But AMAZON wants you to pay 108 bucks to order them together? HELLLLLLOOOO, Amazon, what are you trying to pull?????
